backend/main.mo: Motoko actor providing access control, page view counting, user profiles, restaurant search types, caching, error logging, and API request tracking.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing implemented features, related files, components, and test identifiers.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of major frontend files including components, hooks, utilities, and styling.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base stylesheet defining OKLCH color tokens and theme-aware CSS variables for light and dark mode.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point loading the React application via main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app wiring search flows, results handling, settings panel, visit counter, theming, and query client setup.
frontend/src/components/EmptyState.tsx: UI component showing a friendly prompt and fallback message before any search is performed.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Footer displaying attribution, data source links, and a resilient visit counter with fallback text.
frontend/src/components/FoursquareSettin: UI panel for viewing Foursquare API config status and adding or clearing the API key.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Sticky page header displaying the site logo, title, and a location hint.
frontend/src/components/LoadingState.tsx: Shows a loading indicator and skeleton placeholders while restaurant results are loading.
frontend/src/components/RestaurantList.t: Displays restaurant cards with details and supports selection and map navigation.
frontend/src/components/RestaurantMap.ts: Loads and renders a Leaflet map with restaurant markers, handling errors and selection events.
frontend/src/components/RestaurantResult: Controls overall results display, handling loading, errors, safe mode, and switching between list and map views.
frontend/src/components/SearchSection.ts: Manages city and geolocation-based search logic, including GPS/IP detection, validation, and rate‑limited updates.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches an authenticated or anonymous backend actor using react‑query, refreshing dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useFoursquareConfig.t: Manages Foursquare API key status and mutations via the backend actor, including saving, clearing, and checking configuration.
frontend/src/hooks/useGeolocationWatch.t: Watches the user's geolocation with error handling, tracking status, source, position, and providing start/stop controls.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides context and helpers for Internet Identity authentication, including login, logout, status tracking, and identity persistence.
frontend/src/hooks/useLocationDiagnostic: Reports browser geolocation capability, secure‑context status, and permission state using the Permissions API.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Coordinates restaurant search logic combining Overpass and Foursquare data, with error handling, retries, and result merging.
frontend/src/hooks/useTrafficCounter.ts: Tracks and increments page‑view counts via the backend actor with retry logic and session‑based increment limiting.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers, theme color variables including halal variants, dark mode overrides, background styling, and Leaflet adjustments.
frontend/src/lib/coordinates.ts: Provides coordinate validation logic ensuring numeric, finite lat/lon values within valid ranges.
frontend/src/lib/haversine.ts: Implements the Haversine formula to compute great‑circle distances between two coordinates.
frontend/src/lib/overpass.ts: Builds Overpass QL queries to fetch halal‑related POIs near a location using multiple tag patterns.
frontend/src/lib/placesMerge.ts: Provides name normalization, similarity checks, distance-based duplicate detection, and merging/sorting of restaurant data.
frontend/src/lib/rateLimit.ts: Implements a simple time-based rate limiter with execution control and reset functionality.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClient and InternetIdentity providers and loads global styles.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utilities for reading, storing, and clearing URL parameters with session persistence and hash handling.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with dark mode, theme extensions, halal colors, components, and plugins like typography and animations.
project_state.json: Tracks project metadata including schema versions, feature specs, and known issues. Highlights unstable location tracking and a missing visit counter as current fix requests.
